snippet.title: Hollywood Animal: How To Make a Quick Buck With a Shameless Sequel
snippet.description:
Add to Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2680550/Hollywood_Animal/?utm_medium=sequeltrailer&utm_source=youtube

Your film unexpectedly became the highest-grossing picture of 1959. Where do you go from here? Of course, you capitalize on your success by cutting all possible corners and making an epically monstrous sequel! After all, that's exactly what our latest video is all about. In Hollywood Animal, you run a movie studio over the course of decades, and you're free to grow it however you please — even if it means turning it into a soulless corporate juggernaut.

“There's something strangely satisfying about doing things in games that you hate seeing done in real life," say the developers from Weappy. "You might not find a single cinephile who rejoices in assembly-line filmmaking. But when you find yourself in the manager’s chair, responsible for the survival of a business, like you do in our game, all those time-tested tropes and outrageous cliches suddenly gain a new appeal."

Hollywood Animal is coming to PC later this year.
